SA11n1109:5: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
SA11n1109:7: ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ,
SA11n1109:13: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti |
SA11n1109:18: tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
SA11n1109:21: triratnapratimāsamakṣaṃ sulipya sugandhapuṣpaprakaraṃ suvikīrya tadagrato bhūmau jānunī saṃsthāpya,
SA11n1109:22: kṛtāñjaliḥ daśadiglokadhāta-samastabuddha-samastadharmamahāyānasaṃghasamakṣaṃ ca asaṃkhyānirvācyakāyavyūhān nirmāya teṣāñcaikaikam caraṇayoḥ supraṇamet |
SA11n1109:24: tataḥ pratikāyaṃ anirvacanīyamukhāni pratimukhaṃ cānirvacanīyajihvā nirmāya,
SA11n1109:27: aciram abhisambodhiprāptān buddhān bhagavato dharmacakrapravartanāya adhyeṣayet |
SA11n1109:28: ye dharmacakraṃ pravartya āyuḥ saṃskārān parijihīrṣante, ( tān)
SA11n1109:31: yathā sūtre āgatāni tathā pratyaṅgapadāni savistaraṃ paṭhet |
SA11n1109:32: tataḥ saptapūjānantaraṃ sarvasattvān avalambya triśaraṇagamanapadāni triḥ paṭhet |
SA11n1109:34: yathā vidhau prāpyate tathā ca kuryāt |
SA11n1109:43: tataḥ mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ dharmanaye mahārathināṃ ca mārge avasthānāya pratijānīyāt |
SA11n1109:51: ākāśopamānutpādataḥ pratītyasamutpādabalena nānābhāseyamavasthitiḥ ayam ' aho! āścaryam' iti vicintya aṣṭamāyopamarupeṇa jānīyāt |
SA11n1109:52: tato mahākaruṇacittena samastādṛśyasattvebhyo dharmadeśanārtha yathābodhi mahāyāna-sūtrapāṭhaṃ kuryāt |
SA11n1109:53: tataḥ bhojanāvasare-'ṣaṭtriṃśadaśuciparipūrṇena asāreṇa nāśaparyavasitena kāyenānena tadbuddhadharmakāya-sāramanveṣayāmi' iti vicintya na puṣṭyartha,
SA11n1109:66: tataḥ pūrvāhṇayāmeṣvapi pañcamaprahare yathoktavat sarvaṃ kāryam |
SA11n1109:67: madhyāhne sandhyāyāṃ rātreḥ prathame madhye ca yāme sarvathā yathoktāḥ sarve vidhayaḥ pūrayitavyāḥ |
SA11n1109:74: evaṃ teṣāṃ ṣaḍyāmānām aṣṭādaśadhā vibhāge kṛte sati catuḥpañcāśatkṣaṇā bhaviṣyanti |
SA11n1109:77: śreṣṭhaiḥ samākhyātatamaṃ sumārga bodhiprabhādyaiḥ kalitaśca śiṣyaiḥ |
SA11n1109:78: gattvā mahāyānakulābhijātaiḥ prāpyaṃ padaṃ tad dvipadendrakasya ||4 ||
SA11n1109:82: tenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā ca jayaśīlena anūditā ||
